Major_Arcs.title: The Human Meteor and the Waterfront Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Duke O'Dowd as the Human Meteor and sets up the initial mystery involving playboys, G-Men, and a waterfront rendezvous, leading to Duke's superhero intervention.

sub_scenes.title: Cover and Taxi Ride Setup
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers the cover introduction and the initial taxi ride, setting up Duke's fare and the suspicious circumstances.

sub_scenes.title: G-Men Chase and Human Meteor Emergence
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on the escalating chase by the G-Men and Duke's transformation into the Human Meteor to confront them.

sub_scenes.title: Aftermath and Stowaway Plan
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the immediate aftermath of Human Meteor's intervention, shifting to police reactions and then Duke's plan involving Toby and the yacht.

Major_Arcs.title: Toby's Yacht Investigation and Namor's Intervention
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Toby's mission on the yacht, his discoveries, and the escalating danger, culminating in Namor's arrival and underwater confrontation.

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Infiltration and Discovery
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Toby's activities as a cabin boy, his initial observations, and the crucial discovery of the marked depth chart.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery of the Marked Depth Chart
Reporting to the Captain and Recognition

sub_scenes.title: Namor's Underwater Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers Namor's dive, his discovery of the submarine operation, and his subsequent underwater battle with the divers.

narrative_arcs.title: Namor's Urgent Dive and Submarine Discovery
Underwater Torpedo Operation and Namor's Realization
Targeting the Submarine with a Torpedo

Major_Arcs.title: Ship Attack and Yacht Resolution
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Namor's attack on the ship and his subsequent boarding of the yacht to find evidence, leading to the resolution of the immediate threat and Toby's recovery.

sub_scenes.title: Ship Attack and Crew Reaction
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on the ship crew's reaction to the underwater explosion and Namor's attack on the ship.

narrative_arcs.title: Ship Crew Reacts to Peter's Fate and Geyser
Namor Reaches the Yacht and Confronts the Crew

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Investigation and Escape
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers Namor's search for the depth map on the yacht, its discovery, and the subsequent escape with Toby and Duke, concluding with Toby's hospital visit and return home.

narrative_arcs.title: Searching for the Depth Map in Peter's Cabin
Presenting the Depth Map to the Captain

Major_Arcs.title: The Liberty Lads and the Bus Company Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts to a new storyline featuring the Liberty Lads and boys investigating a suspicious ambulance and bus company, uncovering a Nazi spy ring.

sub_scenes.title: Liberty Lads and Ambulance Arrival
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the Liberty Lads in action and then shifts to a domestic setting where boys observe an ambulance, sparking their curiosity.

narrative_arcs.title: Boys Attempt to Return Dropped Wallet
Discovery of the Wallet and Bus Company Address

sub_scenes.title: Bus Garage and Major Bronson Encounter
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the boys' arrival at the bus garage, their encounter with Major Bronson, and the escalating tension leading to the carbon monoxide plot.

narrative_arcs.title: Marine Salute and Major Bronson's Identity
Explanation of Major Bronson's Civilian Clothes
Returning the Wallet to the Bus Company
Mr. Horst's Abrupt Arrival and Confrontation
Close-up of Mr. Horst's Menacing Face

sub_scenes.title: Bronson's Downfall and Nazi Spy Ring Uncovered
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene culminates in Bronson's betrayal, the fight, marine rescue, and the revelation of the Nazi spy ring.

narrative_arcs.title: Major's Injury and Urgent Medical Aid

Major_Arcs.title: South American Adventure: Rosita's Kidnapping
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts to a South American setting where 'The Champ' and Henry become entangled in the kidnapping of Rosita, the President's daughter, by El Tigre and Axis agents.

sub_scenes.title: Desert Flashback and South American Setting
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene establishes a past adventure in the desert and transitions to the current setting in a South American town.

narrative_arcs.title: Establishment of a South American Town Setting
Hotel Room Standoff and Abrupt Departure
El Tigre's Ransom and Axis Connection

sub_scenes.title: Forced Abduction and Mama's Plea
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the abduction of 'The Champ' and Henry and their arrival at Mama's house, where they learn about Rosita's kidnapping and are asked to help.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at the House and Introduction to 'Mama'
Planning the Infiltration of El Tigre's Hideout

sub_scenes.title: Rescue of Rosita and Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the urgent search for Rosita, the discovery of her location, and the subsequent rescue mission and combat.

narrative_arcs.title: Execution of the Rear Entrance Plan
Machine Gun Threat and Champ's Intervention

Major_Arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan and the Submarine Detector Plans
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Devil Dog Dolan's mission related to compromised submarine detector plans, his jungle combat, capture, and eventual resolution through arson and another jungle fight.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Combat and Captain's Confession
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Devil Dog Dolan in jungle combat and then shifts to a dialogue where Captain Lawton confesses his compromised situation.

narrative_arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan in Action: Jungle Combat

sub_scenes.title: Shipboard Confrontation and Punishment
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene moves to a shipboard setting where the captain gives orders, leading to Dolan's unexpected fight and subsequent corporal punishment, concluding with a service lesson.

Major_Arcs.title: The Twinkle Twins and the Murder Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Twinkle Twins and their investigation into the murder of banker Robert Burgess, leading them through a complex case involving racketeering and a community blood drive.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction and Newspaper Office Assignment
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the Twinkle Twins and the threat they face, transitioning to their assignment in a newspaper office to investigate a murder.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of the Twinkle Twins and the Threat
Encounter with the Nurse and Revelation of Sick Girl
Reilly's Daughter and the Need for Farnacci's Blood
Phoning Elijah from the Candy Store
Arrival in Irish Section and Reilly Pursuit
Unfruitful Search for Reilly in Irish Section
Encounter with Mrs. Murphy and Revelation of Reilly's Daughter's Plight
Dan Intervenes and Confronts Gunman on Car Roof
Police Arrival and Apprehension of Criminals
Awaiting News and Doctor's Diagnosis at the Hospital
Blood Donation Offer and Compatibility Issue
Urgent Call for Blood and Community Mobilization at Hospital
Blood Type Confirmation and Donor Preparation
The Life-Saving Transfusion and Immediate Revival
Post-Transfusion Observation and Anticipation of Recovery
Planning Farnacci's Capture and Police Pursuit
Forced Blood Donation and Birthday Celebration for Recovery
